text: Allah hee ne tumhaare liye apni paida karda cheezo mein se saaye banaye hai aur osi ne tumhaare liye pahaado mein ghaar banaye hai aur osi ne tumhaare liye kurte banaaye hai jo tumhe garmi se bachaaye aur aise kurte bhi jo tumhe ladaayi ke waqt kaam aaye, wo isi tarah apni puri puri nemate de raha hai ke tum hukm bardaar ban jaao
